meanings.definition: Crouch or sit with one's knees bent and one's heels close to or touching one's buttocks.
meanings.sent1: I like to squat down to pet my dog.
meanings.sent2: She had to squat to pick up the fallen pen.
meanings.sent3: The frog decided to squat next to the pond for a rest.
meanings.sent4: The tired hiker had to squat on a rock to catch his breath.
meanings.sent5: The gardener had to squat to reach the low-hanging fruits.

meanings.definition: A position in which one's knees are bent and one's heels are close to or touching one's buttocks.
meanings.sent1: The yoga instructor demonstrated the perfect squat.
meanings.sent2: He held the squat position for a minute during the exercise.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's favorite game was playing in a squat.
meanings.sent4: The baseball catcher crouched into a squat behind the plate.
meanings.sent5: The weightlifter's squat was impressive at the competition.

meanings.definition: A building or room occupied by squatters.
meanings.sent1: The abandoned house became a squat for homeless people.
meanings.sent2: The authorities cleared out the illegal squat last week.
meanings.sent3: The old factory turned into a squat for artists to work in.
meanings.sent4: The group of friends found a cozy squat to stay for the night.
meanings.sent5: The police raided the squat and arrested the squatters.
